channel.title: Z835
channel.description:
[CENTER] [SIZE=10][COLOR="#FF0000"]Z[/COLOR][COLOR="#FFFFFF"][FONT=Fixedsys]835[/FONT][/COLOR][/SIZE]
Z835 is a RuneScape Private Server that has been, underdevelopment for a month now and is based off virtue 835. the goal here is for the team to add new content and improve the source . Data Revision: 838 soon to be 858 Client Version 835 Item Data Base: [url=http://www.itemdb.biz]www.itemdb.biz[/url] Commands: players, item, tele, ::comands Download Link: [URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/cl8b3feu6lef6ue/Z835.jar?dl=0"]Here[/URL] Reminder: This is still under development some stuff may or may not work but it will be update everyday, post what you want first! ServerType: It will be like RuneScape but with shortcuts . This will be a live developed source and will be online 24/7 with updates several times a day. . The whole point in this is to make a RS3 server like the original matrix release for 718, as much content and a easy player serverwith bossing and quests and even minigames. . . [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oD6UEM6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tWOGIZk.png[/img] . . [LEFT] [B]Team[/B]
[ul][*]Eric [*]Ethan [*]Dylan [*]God [*]Tom[/ul]
. [B]Server Goals[/B]
[ul][*][COLOR="#FF0000"]Rewrite Combat System[/COLOR] [*][COLOR="#FFFF00"]All Skills working[/COLOR] [*][COLOR="#FFFF00"]All minigames working[/COLOR] [*][COLOR="#FF0000"]Quest System[/COLOR] [*][COLOR="#FFFF00"]New Dialouge System[/COLOR] [*][COLOR="#FFFF00"]Stable enjoyable server[/COLOR][/ul]
. [B]Server Bugs[/B]
[ul][*]Fixed Legacy [COLOR="#FF0000"]BROKEN[/COLOR] [*]Memory Leak with saving [COLOR="#00FF00"]FIXED[/COLOR] [*]Will list when reported...[/ul]
[/LEFT] . [B]Update Log[/B] [CODE] 11/6/15 - Team and Project became official, the last months same bugs from the list were fixed and a few networking exceptions fixed, [/CODE] . [SPOILER=Random Pictures] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vDLwUpG.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gxnmAgZ.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/iwPucvg.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5XDdyua.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TBYNAVf.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jqQMSob.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/S918qGI.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/a9tgJoY.png[/img]
[/SPOILER]
Credits Virtue Matrix Dkk cache editor
[/CENTER]

item.title: Z835
item.dc:creator: @Sir_James1996 Sir James1996
item.description:
@Sir_James1996 wrote:

[CENTER]
[SIZE=10][COLOR="#FF0000"]Z[/COLOR][COLOR="#FFFFFF"][FONT=Fixedsys]835[/FONT][/COLOR][/SIZE]

Z835 is a RuneScape Private Server that has been,
underdevelopment for a month now and is based off virtue 835.
the goal here is for the team to add new content and improve the source
.
Data Revision: 838 soon to be 858
Client Version 835
Item Data Base: www.itemdb.biz
Commands: players, item, tele, ::comands
Download Link: Here
Reminder: This is still under development some stuff may or may not work but it will be update everyday, post what you want first!
ServerType: It will be like RuneScape but with shortcuts
.
This will be a live developed source and will be online 24/7 with updates several times a day.
.
The whole point in this is to make a RS3 server like the original matrix release for 718,
as much content and a easy player serverwith bossing and quests and even minigames.
.
.


.
